channel.title: laziness – deadbadger.net
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: Bird net facial
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: Devoid of inspiration? Fingers listless, tired? Check your google searches for fun and profit (and cheap blog posts). Boring of late, mine have shown sparks of life this week. We begin with the promising “big feces” – apparently Gillian McKeith* is a fan. Less excitingly, my site is now a veritable hub for all things Continue reading →
